Uses of Class
application.Robot

  • Uses of Robot in application

    Subclasses of Robot in application
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AdvancedRobot
    Represents an advanced robot that inherits from BasicRobot.
    class 
    BasicRobot
    Represents a Basic Robot that moves within the arena, has sensors to detect obstacles, and can adjust its behavior based on sensor inputs.
    class 
    KillerRobot
    Represents a Killer Robot that can kill other robots by colliding with them.
    class 
    TeleportingRobot
    A subclass of BasicRobot that introduces teleportation behavior.
    class 
    UserControlledRobot
    A subclass of BasicRobot that is controlled by user input.
    Methods in application that return types with arguments of type Robot
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<Robot>
    RobotArena.getAllRobots()
    Provides read-only access to the list of all robots in the arena.
    Methods in application with parameters of type Robot
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    RobotArena.addRobott(Robot robot)
    Adds a custom robot to the arena.
    boolean
    RobotArena.checkHit(Robot target)
    Checks if a specific target robot is being hit by any basic robot.
    boolean
    Robot.hitting(Robot oRobot)
    Checks if the robot is colliding with another robot.
    void
    RobotArena.removeRobot(Robot robot)
    Removes a robot from the arena.
